ApproachedUnfortunateGnome.synopsis: Rather than openly approaching the goblins/worgs near the windmill, a player snuck by and then gets spotted once they're near the windmill. Combat starts immediately.
ApproachedUnfortunateGnome.how_to_trigger: Get spotted by the goblins after first sneaking near the windmill (e.g. around -1; 37; 424 in WLD_Main_A)
